title: Inside Davina Rankin's very glamorous baby shower: MAFS star hosts a pink-themed bash
text:
Married At First Sight's Davina Rankin is about to give birth to her first child.

And on Sunday, the reality star celebrated the upcoming arrival of her daughter with a very glamorous baby shower with friends at Paw Paw Cafe in East Brisbane.

The 28-year-old glammed-up for the occasion, wearing a glowing face of makeup that included foundation, eye shadow, and lipstick.

Oh baby! Davina Rankin celebrated the upcoming arrival of her daughter with a very glamorous baby shower with friends at Paw Paw Cafe in East Brisbane

She also showed off her burgeoning bump in a stretchy Fuchsia dress.

Taking to her Instagram page, she shared a series of snaps from the lunch.

'I am so overwhelmed to be honest I really didn’t want a baby shower, but I’m so glad my beautiful best friend @gillzy_ convinced me!,' she captioned the post.

'I am so overwhelmed to be honest I really didn’t want a baby shower, but I’m so glad my beautiful best friend @gillzy_ convinced me!,' she captioned a series of posts

She went on to say that her friend decided to take it into her own hands to organise it all, and she was amazed at the results.

Davina continued: 'It was so lovely to have so many people I love in the same room to celebrate little Miss Manuel.'

The East Brisbane restaurant was decked out in an array of floral decorations around the room.

Pretty in pink: The East Brisbane restaurant was decked out in an array of floral decorations around the room

Her friends kept true to the 'pink' theme, with a mix of pink and white coloured balloons.

The baby shower guests were treated to custom Brittasweets biscuits emblazoned 'Little Miss Manuel' across the front and a matching cake.

Good friends! Davina said one of her friends decided to take it into her own hands to organise it all, and she was amazed at the results

Cute! The baby shower guests were treated to custom Brittasweets biscuits emblazoned 'Little Miss Manuel' across the front

Meanwhile, taking to Instagram on Thursday, Davina shared a 'bump update' with her followers.

'5 WEEKS TO GO (give or take how impatient or stubborn Miss Manuel is),' she captioned a photo of herself kneeling on her bed in white lace underwear and a printed robe.

'This week has been a little weird, earlier in the week I started getting some cramping and aches (even a labour scare lol) but it's also been the first week I've started spending more time on my exercise ball, and also doing some light techniques to help turn my breech little babe around,' she continued.

Taking to Instagram on last Thursday, the 28-year-old former Married At First Sight star shared a 'bump update' with her followers

It's the first child for the former reality star and her fiance, Jaxon Manuel, but Davina said that there hasn't been any new parent jitters.

'Overall, I'm feeling really calm, weirdly relaxed, and actually not stressed... which is funny because I'm a massive over thinker usually, but for this, I just feel ready,' she said.
description: Married At First Sight's Davina Rankin is about to give birth to her first child.
authors: Ali Daher For Daily Mail Australia
